item.title: Plot details are under wraps, but the film is rumored to center on two young women of faith who are lured into a cat-and-mouse game in the home of an eccentric man.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘ONLY MURDERS IN THE BUILDING’ season 3 debuts on Hulu on August 8.
(https://thewrap.com/selena-gomez-interview-emmys-only-murders-in-the-building/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Selena Gomez on working with Meryl Streep: “It takes your breath away to be around someone who has paved the way for so many actresses and told so many powerful stories. And she couldn’t have been more humble, more nice. She was so sweet to everyone. It was really inspiring.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Selena Gomez covers the latest issue of The Wrap

item.title: Steven Soderbergh’s series ‘FULL CIRCLE’ starring Zazie Beetz, Claire Danes, Timothy Olyphant, Jharrel Jerome and more debuts on Max on July 13.
